metadata.title: CVE-2023-4045 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
Offscreen Canvas did not properly track cross-origin tainting, which couldhave been used to access image data from another site in violation ofsame-origin policy. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 116, Firefox ESR <102.14, and Firefox ESR < 115.1.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-4045` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

thunderbird - 1:115.2.0+build1-0ubuntu1
thunderbird-gnome-support - 1:115.2.0+build1-0ubuntu1
thunderbird-mozsymbols - 1:115.2.0+build1-0ubuntu1
xul-ext-calendar-timezones - 1:115.2.0+build1-0ubuntu1
xul-ext-gdata-provider - 1:115.2.0+build1-0ubuntu1
xul-ext-lightning - 1:115.2.0+build1-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:115.2.0+build1-0ubuntu1').
mozjs102 package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
